channel.title: CLOSED: Jun 3: Upgrade Voting

item.title: Re: Jun 3: Upgrade Voting
item.content:encoded: Darkshard - Interrogators

item.title: Re: Jun 3: Upgrade Voting
item.content:encoded: Chidon - Chunin Training School

item.title: Re: Jun 3: Upgrade Voting
item.content:encoded: Indeed… come'on guys don't blindly follow Uzuki :P you have the right to vote! use it well :P

item.title: Re: Jun 3: Upgrade Voting
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, I agree. 2.9 million XP in a few days isn't too increadibly difficult, and if redeye and legacy can do it, surely whiteeye can too.

Personally, I'd rather get the upgrades that will aid anyone, regardless of their bloodline. We already have the Jonin Training Academy, so that was my rationale for getting the Chunin (followed by Genin) next. They're increadibly cheap, and the three combined help anyone, save sannins.

The Chunin and Genin Training Schools cost 120,000 ryo combined. At our current rate, that's 1 day. On the other hand, if we get the Eternal Mirrors, which costs 1,000,000 ryo, first, it'd take about a week before we'd be able to get the next upgrade.

Given the choice between delaying Eternal Mirrors by one day and delaying both training schools by a week, I'd think it'd make more sense to get the training schools first.

Of course the voting's not on my side. >.>

Edit: Fixed minor error

item.content:encoded: That would be because I forgot my +1 Range from my Awesome Pants and another +1 Range from my Dark Band.

item.title: Re: Jun 3: Upgrade Voting
item.content:encoded: 35 Tai range on a mission with a difficulty of 36 gets you zero successes :)

item.title: Re: Jun 3: Upgrade Voting
item.content:encoded: …I did it neither of those ways. I went Jonin (12) + Aviators (+1) + Regalia (+1) + K-Dog's (+1) + Chakra Armor (+1) + Sporty (+4) + Bone Daddy (+4) + Letter of Marque (+1) + Awesome Pants (+1) + Dark Band (+1) + Kido: Nightfall (+10) = 37 Tai range. Add Hermano and Tats for +5 str, season with WhiteEye's +3 levels and a Monochrome Pheromone.

item.title: Re: Jun 3: Upgrade Voting
item.content:encoded: The Tai 36 difficulty 8 success mission to get Smiley. Fury+Timmy2+Letter of Marque = 8 Tai successes. (I suppose you could Vanilla for 4, Fletch for 2, Bone Daddy for 4 and Kido Nightfall for 10, putting you at +20 range, giving you 32 before items. The rest can be made up with items, and some luck in hitting 36 difficulty with a low strength party, but the Fury route is much safer. But I guess that shaves half a million XP off)

item.title: Re: Jun 3: Upgrade Voting
item.content:encoded: What do you need Fury of the Storm for?

item.title: Re: Jun 3: Upgrade Voting
item.content:encoded:
Monochrome missions require you to learn well over 1m in jutsu to progress within the space of a few days. You'll pretty much need the following:

Kido: Harder Better - 500 000 XP
Lucha Libre Style: Faster Stronger - 500 000 XP
Lucha Libre Style: Pity the Fool - 500 000 XP
Soul Reaper Style: Fury of the Storm - 500 000 XP
Kido: Nightfall - 500,000 XP
Robogirl Style: Leek Spin - 85,000 XP
Archer Style: Blind Guardian - 150.000 XP
Archer Style: Dragonforce - 150.000 XP

Total: ~2.9 million XP. That's the absolute minimum you need to complete monochrome, so yeah…half jutsu cost is definitely a really sweet bonus for WhiteEye.

item.title: Re: Jun 3: Upgrade Voting
item.content:encoded:
Is Eternal Mirrors even worth the 1,000,000 ryo it costs? I've never had a problem with the jutsu being too expensive. Seems like a waste to me.

Anyway,

Vote: Lear- Chunin Training School

item.title: Jun 3: Upgrade Voting
item.content:encoded:
Voting is now consolidated for upgrades. There's no separation between advanced upgrades and regular upgrades.

  • Fortified Walls
  • Ninja Attack Squad
  • Saboteur School
  • Genin Training School
  • Chunin Training School - 3 - Arkantos, Chidon, Lear
  • Solidarity
  • Siege Engines
  • Invasion Defense
  • Interrogators - 1 - Darkshard
  • Overseers
  • Scattered Outposts
  • Special Forces (Ninjutsu)
  • Special Forces (Taijutsu)
  • Tall Walls
  • Sabotage Facility
  • Village Memorial - 1 - Bayard
  • Spartan Battleground
  • Eternal Mirrors - 6 - Ainn, DareDevil, GogoluG, naito, schon, Uzuki
